sentences.sContent: This is the issue for Socrates, how to channel this wild and untamed passion of spirit or heart, how to channel this to some kind of common good.
sentences.sContent_eng: This is the issue for Socrates, how to channel this wild and untamed passion of spirit or heart, how to channel this to some kind of common good.
sentences.sCn: 这是苏格拉底面临的难题，如何引导，这野性不驯的精神或内心热情，如何将其引导至某种共同的良善。

synos.tran: 不能抑制的；难控驭的；未驯服的

trans.tranOther: untamed land is still in its natural state and has not been developed by people
